about_the_game:
Attention all card game fans:

DOCAAY – The online collectible card game of the next generation!
Draw. Collect. Trade. Sell.

DOCAAY is an online collectible card game where each card tells its own story. Draw, collect, trade, or sell your most valuable cards to climb the leaderboard and unlock exclusive rewards. Immerse yourself in a library full of mystical tales for each card and expand your inventory with hourly drops.

A game full of mysteries:

Discover mystical stories behind each card and experience the depth of a game that combines collecting passion and trading.

Welcome to the world of DOCAAY – Collect them all!

Campfire

Step into the exciting world of DOCAAY and let yourself be enveloped by the magic of a mystical campfire. At a quiet campsite, under a sparkling starry sky, you’ll find your retreat, inviting you to stay. But beneath this apparent calm lies a thrilling secret.
Every hour, the power of this place awakens, and with a single click, a new card is revealed to you. Will it be a common, epic, or legendary card?
The atmosphere, the serenity, and the crackling of the fire combine to create a unique experience as you expand your collection. Collect them all!

Compendium

Every card in DOCAAY tells a story – and the Compendium is the place where these stories come to life. Much like a precious library, the Compendium opens the doors to a world full of secrets. Learn more about the origins, powers, and hidden tales of every card you collect. The Compendium allows you to admire your collection and dive deep into the mystical narratives.

name: DOCAAY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-Core CPU, 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 120 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible GPU with at least 512 MB VRAM (e.g., Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-Core CPU, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 150 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.5 compatible GPU with 1 GB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet

short_description: DOCAAY is a collectible card game where you draw, collect, trade, and sell cards. Collect them all, climb the ranks, and unlock exclusive rewards!
